## ckube install helm

Install charts to pure Kubernetes

### Synopsis

Install charts to pure Kubernetes

```
ckube install helm <Chart directory> [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help          help for helm
  -n, --name string   helm charm nickname (required)
```
